mdata.expanded: Upgrade to the optional Toyota Touch & Go to be even more connected. Toyota Touch and Go adds full map satellite navigation, connected services and text messaging functionality to the standard Toyota Touch Multimedia System.
Black heated leather & Alcantara seats are available as an option on the GT86, adding extra style and comfort to your car.
